org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class FontItem<P extends AbstractModel<?,?>,D extends IsDefaultFontItem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractModel<P,D>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.FontItem<P,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - parent node class
    D - defaults provider class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultFontItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTick, LegendLabels, PointLabels, ScaleLabel, Title

    public abstract class FontItem<P extends AbstractModel<?,?>,D extends IsDefaultFontItem>
extends AbstractModel<P,D>
implements IsDefaultFontItem
    Base object to map font options for configuration.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
